title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Technology-Based Educational Reform: Understanding Through Critical Case Studies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the socio-political contexts of technology-based education policies through case comparisons.
Learners can critically evaluate practical challenges arising when introducing digital education tools.
Learners can propose technology integration strategies in educational settings based on case studies from Australia and Singapore.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
